name: Noisiju
description:
You are the last Kaiju to restore Earth to its natural rhythm, destroy all buildings and make nature bloom again.

Controls: 

  1. [WASD] -  Move 
  2. [Mouse Left Click] - Punch
  3. [M] - Dance
  4. [Escape] -  Exit

Programming, Music and Level Design :  Animanoir

Models, Sprites, Art and Sounds: Skarmuse

Game inspired on Retro Kaiju model sets

Entry for KaijuJam
